Malice grinned and absorbed the shots.  He drew his rifle and used the absorbed energy to fire five high energy blasts fom his disuptor rifle.  He draws back his sword and launches the whip sword again, all the while grinning as the devil.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:

Nightstrike::

Nightstrike dodged the strike and with a devil smile he said "Then 
play should start"

Nightstrike aimed and shot 25 times



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Organics/ Malice:
>  
> Organics smiled as she stood up.  She put the rest of the baby 
food away and then set out to find little Elita.  She was stepping 
out of the mess hall when she recieved the transmission from 
Rodimus.  She found Malice and Wolfblade still in the labs.
> "Malice!  Wolfblade!  Rodimus needs your help!  Go, I have to find 
Elita!" 
>  
> Malice looked down at Wolfblade.
> "Come on, we need to go help the others."
> The TM2 male stood and hurried out of the labs and out of the 
base.  He rushed out and found the closest Minion, Night Strike.  
His easy going mood he had or the past day or two melted away to his 
more maleviolent nature.  He drew his sword, extended it into it's 
whip mode, and launched the serrated weapon at Night Strike.
> "C'mere, let's play!" 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Elita:
> 
> Elita run away and hide
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Organics:
> >  
> > She set the baby down in the floor and put the bottle in an 
> insulated spare part compartment in her shield.
> > "Well alright then.  I guess we can go play," the valkyrie said 
as 
> she shifted her weight in her seat.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Elita:
> > 
> > Elita refused the bottle infact she wasn't hungry and was more 
> > willign to play something.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Ultimate Archfiend of 
> Darkness, 
> > Devouring" <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > Organics:
> > > 
> > > She almost caught the flying bottle, but the tables and her 
> wings 
> > got 
> > > in the way and the bottle bounced off the floor.  Sh walked 
over 
> > and 
> > > picked it up and turned to th table.  She sat down and this 
time 
> > > picked up Elita, sat her in her lap, and then gave the baby 
the 
> > > bottle, hoping she would get the message.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
> wrote:
> > > Elita::
> > >  
> > > Elita laughted more and beliving that it was asort of play she 
> > took 
> > > the bottle and trew it again
> > >  
> > >  
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > Organics:
> > >   
> > > Organics reacted in time to catch the bottle before it fell to 
> the 
> > > floor.  Now a little upset, she sets the bottle down hard in 
> front 
> > > of Elita.
> > > "You can't be doing that.  Now drank your bottle and we might 
go 
> > > play outside or something." the valkyrie said, her voice stern.
